title: We Can Fix This (Ep 1776)
description:
In this episode, I address the tragedy in Uvalde, Texas and what can be done RIGHT NOW to prevent it. 

News Picks:


The Secret Service study on targeted school violence that everyone should read.


New information on the school shooting in Texas.

Studies on the “assault weapons” ban do not say what Biden claims. 


The link to the “assault weapons” ban study.

State Farm Exec Apologizes to Angry Agents, Says 'We Made a Mistake With Our Involvement' With GenderCool.

content:encoded:
In this episode, I address the tragedy in Uvalde, Texas and what can be done RIGHT NOW to prevent it. 


News Picks:

  • The Secret Service study on targeted school violence that everyone should read.
  • New information on the school shooting in Texas.
  • Studies on the “assault weapons” ban do not say what Biden claims. 
  • The link to the “assault weapons” ban study.
  • State Farm Exec Apologizes to Angry Agents, Says 'We Made a Mistake With Our Involvement' With GenderCool.
